title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Analysis of Career Decision Factors and Support Strategies for Graduate Students in Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of instructional design theory and social cognitive career theory
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core concepts of Social Cognitive Career Theory (SCCT) explaining career decision-making difficulties of graduate students in instructional design
Learners can measure career decision-making barriers (lack of readiness, lack of information, information inconsistency) using the CDDQ (Career Decision Difficulty Questionnaire)
Learners can propose career support strategies reflecting country-specific characteristics of graduate students based on research findings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
